SELECT b.board_id, b.parent_id, b.user_id, b.title, b.writer, b.detail, b.views, b.insert_user, b.insert_date, b.update_user, b.update_date, a.attachment_id, a.file_name, a.file_path, a.file_size FROM BOARD b LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT a ON b.board_id = a.board_id WHERE b.parent_id = #{parentId} AND b.use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY b.insert_date ASC
